   contain the root `toctree` directive.

==============================
TreasureChest's documentation
==============================

This is the root document for project Treasure Box.
Treasure Chest is a light-weight IT device management system. You can register, 
update, delete as management user and you can view and request IT device as 
normal user. The device includes computer, printer, monitors, etc. 





.. toctree::
  :caption: Development Documents 
  :maxdepth: 2

  Software Requirement Specification (SRS)
  Software Design Specification (SDS)



.. toctree::
  :caption: Doc Test Section
  :maxdepth: 2	

  test_page
